Package org.eclipse.wst.xsl.invoker

Interface Summary
IProcessorInvoker Interface used by the launched process to define the XSL transformation pipeline.
 

Class Summary
JAXPSAXProcessorInvoker An implementation of IProcessorInvoker that uses JAXP as the underlying transformation mechanism.
Main The class whose main method is called when launching the transformation process from Eclipse.
Messages Messages for the transformation.
 

Exception Summary
ConfigurationException An exception thrown when configuration of an XSL transform pipeline fails.
TransformationException Checked Exception for transformation errors.
